text: She jetted off to Peru with daughter Kylie Jenner to meet children with cleft palates. And on Thursday, Kris Jenner took some time for herself while in the city of Cusco, where she was spotted shopping at a local market. The 61 - year - old tried on a furry hat as well as cradled a baby goat during her excursion, later joined by Kylie's friends. So, do you need a momager? Kris jenner cradled a kid while in the city of Cusco, Peru this week Hat trick : The star also tried on new headgear during a tour of the local market The Kardashian matriarch and daughter Kylie met with children suffering from the facial birth defect while in Peru, in association with the Smile Train organization.
